metadata.synopsis: Joshua Jackson and James King star as Earl and Baby, two young lovers with a plan to escape their small Texas town. But when Baby's dim-witted cousin Junior (D.J. Qualls) gets tangled up in a whole heap of trouble, Earl has just 48 hours to save the day, rescue Junior and keep his promise to get his Baby to Los Angeles in time for sweeps.

reviews: Director David Semel takes Trevor Munson's unique, but inadequate screenplay and turns it into a mediocre film.
Sometime's nonsensical popcorn pleasers like "The Skulls" might be more beneficial to your career. Eh, Josh?
